amendment.description: To increase funding for small business programs at the Small Business Administration such as microloans, Women's Business Centers, and Small Business Development Centers.

vote.text: Amendment SA 616 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 616 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Kerry. (consideration: CR S3673-3677; text: CR S 3673) To increase funding for small business programs at the Small Business Administration such as microloans, Women's Business Centers, and Small Business Development Centers.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 616 proposed by Senator Conrad for Senator Kerry.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 616 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
